mapper.select: select p.id, p.title, p.description from question_paper_library l left join library_paper_link lp on l.id = lp.lib_id and l.is_deleted = 0 and lp.is_deleted = 0 left join question_paper p on p.id = lp.paper_id and p.is_deleted = 0 and lp.is_deleted = 0 where l.id = #{libId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and p.id is not null and l.is_deleted = 0
